name: Modok Wins
description:
This is a free game that is for the blog March Modok Madness. The concept is that Modok wins, there is no lose condition for the game. Modok can shoot explode or sheild his way through waves of enemies till the timer is up. The score is arbitrary, not necessarily random, but with random spawns you should never get the same score twice. This game is as silly as it is simple and I hope everyone that plays it enjoys it.

Controls.

Arrow keys move you

A - Analyze Cube

Space Bar - Laser

Collide with enemies to raise your shield

Credits:

Art and Design

http://slyshand.deviantart.com/

http://sebasebs.tumblr.com/

I don't own any of the characters involved. All art was created custom for the game, and this game should never ever EVER cost you a single penny.
